page.title: 19Sport in Guilsborough
page.content: Our school does a lot of sport,most of the boys play football at playtime as well as in football matches and the netballers do the same.In the summer the children play cricket.We also go to village called Long Buckby to do athletics in the summer.Where I live we also have a youth club which you can get into free and there are lots of games you can play like table tennis, this is a game where you use a net on a table,2 bats and a ping-pong ball.In Guilsborough there is also an adult cricket and a football team.Cricket is a good sport for which you need 11 people per side and you play it on a grass pitch.When I go home after school I sometimes play cricket with my brothers,during the half terms and in holidays I play cricket and tennis.
